item.content:encoded:
Father’s Day Card for Poppa

Big Deals! Father’s Day Card for Poppa – Fathers Day Cards Father’s Day Card for Poppa products are in stock Father’s Day Card for Poppa quality products and have the highest number of reviews in the same categoryFather’s Day’s Day Card for Poppa. You call your grandfather Poppa, not Grandpa. So get your Poppa a Father’s Day card made especially for him! This cute outdoorsy card is perfect for any Poppa who loves camping, nature, the outdoors, and looking up at the stars in the night sky with his kids. The Father’s Day card features a grandfather bear and a grandchild bear sitting outdoors by a campfire and tent in the wilderness looking up at the stars in the sky and the mountains. The cute Scandinavian-style text reads: Happy Poppa’s Day!

Make this card customizable! Click "Edit Design", "Inside Bottom/Right: Text & Images", "Text", and "Add text" to write your own custom, personalized message to Poppa inside! Price:$4.12
